    initAnimalListPanel() - Methode in Klasse gui.animalview.AnimalViewPanel

    initLists() - Methode in Klasse gui.animalview.AnimalViewPanel
    Initializes the lists within the panel, including the main animal list on the left and the incident/examination lists on the right.
    initOutput() - Methode in Klasse gui.animalview.AnimalViewPanel
    Initializes the output components, primarily the center panel for displaying animal details.
